datoCmsKey.name: Joanna Burns

headshot.title: Joanna Burns, headshot via Editor, 1:19:01 AM 10/24/2020

datoCmsKey.danceExperience: Moderate tap experience - beginner to early intermediate
datoCmsKey.bio: I am very interested in building artistic community and have met some of the coolest people during my last few years collaborating in NYC. Background: My initial training is in Musical Theatre performance. I put out a full length record and toured the country as a singer-songwriter for 5 years- then finally landed back home. Since then, I’ve purposed myself to write new musical theatre music. And often perform that music. And other people’s music.
